name: Montague / Yreka Community Pickleball Courts
description: Montague / Yreka Community Pickleball Courts is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Montague, CA. There are 3 outdoor hard courts. The lines are permanent, but you'll need to bring your own net. Amenities include restrooms and lights. The courts are free.
hours: Monday-Thursday: 7:30 AM - 4:00 PM Friday: CLOSED Â© 2026 Designed & Hosted by Town Web | Accessibility | Privacy Policy

name: Pickleball Courts at Mt Shasta
description: Come play pickleball at Pickleball Courts at Mt Shasta in Mount Shasta, CA! There are 8 outdoor asphalt courts. These are dedicated courts with permanent lines and nets. The facility includes amenities like restrooms and water. The courts are free.

name: Scott Valley Berean Church
description: Come play pickleball at Scott Valley Berean Church in Etna, CA! There are 2 indoor concrete courts. Tape lines have been laid, and portable nets are available. The courts are free. The facility includes amenities like restrooms.

name: Siskiyou Family YMCA
description: Siskiyou Family YMCA is one of the most popular places to play pickleball in Yreka, CA. There are 3 indoor wood courts. The lines are permanent, and portable nets are available. Players have access to restrooms and water. A membership is required to play.
fees: Members only — $8/day drop-in or YMCA membership
